channel.title: Urgent build on Squarespace
channel.description:
[quote="kirsten.zeng@tbwa.com"] Hi,
This is Kirsten from TBWA. Recently, we have used Sqaurespace to build a website, you can find the preview from here <http://aids-concern.squarespace.com/>. But for some reasons, we need to find some specialists help us to build the rest of the pages (Policy, Media and Support Us) in next three days. So just want to know if you were possible to help. Since this is quite urgent, great if you can get back to me at your soonest.
To know more details on the rest of the page, you can refer to the pdf attached.
Besides, we need to fix some comments on other pages, which will also need your help to check, please kindly refer to the comment pdf attached.
Looking for your reply.
Thanks Kirsten [/quote]

item.title: Urgent build on Squarespace
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

I couldn't find not a PDF nor any file attached.

From a quick glance, I also couldn't find any issues on the pages listed there...

That being said, I am available to work and we definitely can talk business even if you need such an urgent due date.

I do need much more details though. Please read www.cregox.com/your-home for more details about me.

Read full topic

item.title: Urgent build on Squarespace

item.description:
@system wrote:

Hi,
